types:type.name: OrderInput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type OrderInput = {| CustomerID: String, OrderDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"CustomerID\\\":\\\"Asmita\\\",\\\"OrderDate\\\":\\\"12-11-2222\\\"}"}

types:type.name: OrderOutput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type OrderOutput = {| CustomerID: String, OrderDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"CustomerID\\\":\\\"GREAL\\\",\\\"OrderDate\\\":\\\"02-08-2021\\\"}"}
